text: He was a man who had been imprisoned. Through a fenced-out window in his cell he liked to look outside. Every day he would look out the window, and whenever he saw someone passing by the other side of the bars, he would explode in sounds and unstoppable laughter. The guard was really surprised. One day he couldn't help but ask the prisoner, "Hey, man, why do you get all these laughs day after day?" "What do you mean, what am I laughing at?" the prisoner asked. But you're blind! I laugh at all those people out there. Can't you see they're trapped behind these bars? FIN
title: Un preso singular
author: nan Anónimo
